subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The high-spending English soccer team is in danger of not advancing in the Champions League after it lost, 2-1, to Napoli, with Edinson Cavani scoring both goals for the Italian club.
snippet: The high-spending English soccer team is in danger of not advancing in the Champions League after it lost, 2-1, to Napoli, with Edinson Cavani scoring both goals for the Italian club.
